page.title: 13LOCAL NEWS
page.content:
Local newspapers like the "Informer", "Leader",and "Focus"do not have national events in them but just local news,and charity events,fairs and other small events.
They have lots of sections like a zodiac, a gardens column and some form of puzzle.The middle four pages are frequently reserved for advertising property.There is a "classified" section containing many small,private notices under different headings.These include,notices,marriages,birthdays, deaths,sales,employment and others.
At the back of the paper there are usually sports pages with results and league tables.
These papers are free.
